description:
Bredell & Bredell is a family law firm that is dedicated to helping your family and others throughout Ann Arbor, Michigan, recover just compensation following a personal injury. From the free initial consultation until the delivery of the final judgment, we will give your case the attention, respect and compassion that it demands. We will also put our wealth of resources and years of experience to work for you to maximize your recovery and ensure you receive no less than the full value of your claim.

Our law firm does not shy away from any type of personal injury case. From standard motor vehicle accident cases to claims involving catastrophic injuries to wrongful death lawsuits, our family is prepared to advocate on behalf of victims in a variety of cases. Our breadth of experience extends to the following areas:

•Car accidents

•Trucking accidents

•Medical malpractice

•Workers’ compensation

•Premises liability

•Wrongful death

•Denial of insurance claims

Since our inception in 1991, Bredell & Bredell has built a reputation for providing superior legal services to injured parties and their families who just want justice for wrongs committed against them. Since 2009, Michigan Super Lawyers magazine has thought fit to include our law firm in its roster. Due to our multi-million dollar record, we are members of the Multi-Million Dollar Advocacy Club. Also due to our track record of success and high ethical standards, we hold the highest peer rating possible of AV Preeminent* from Martindale-Hubbell.

Every day, we work to better the lives of individuals who now face extreme hardship due to another party’s negligence. Whether that means accepting credit cards as payment, working on a contingency fee basis or just being available when our clients need us most, we do it.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
